item.description:
Organizer - Monica Trust (978)877-1119

 

As part of my training to keep up my stamina and endurance for long and challenging hikes I try to run regularly. To keep motivated I will be scheduling some small 3-5 mile training runs as well as some races. I hope to attract a small group of runners to join me. Most of the runs will be scheduled in Nashua, NH at Mines falls through trails. But if you have suggestions on other trails, please email me.

Mines Falls Park

Just over 325 acres, Mine Falls Park is the perfect place for a trail run.  Easy to navigate and safe, the trails are even marked with numbered plaques that correspond to GPS points pre-mapped by emergency services. Although the abundantly wide main trails are only 2.4 miles end to end, there's easily 10-15 miles of smaller single track trails complete with streams, rivers and canals.

 

=========================

I have just signed up for a 5K in Manchester. If you are interested in joining me, you will need to sign up on the site listed below.

https://millenniumreg.com/2012-manchester-mile
item.name: 5k race in Manchester, NH
